name: ﻿Cocktail name
Spec: Spec
Instructions: Instructions

name: Banana Daiquiri
Spec: 2 oz Rum,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Banana Liqueur,.25 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with a banana wheel.

name: Bourbon Berry Smash
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,1 oz Simple Syrup,.75 oz Lemon Juice,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,2 Raspberries,3 Blackberries
Instructions:
Muddle berries in shaker
Wet Shake
Double Strain
Serve w/ Ice in rocks glass
Garnish with Lemon Peel

name: Bourbon Daisy
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Simple Syrup,.5 oz Orgeat,1 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions:
Wet Shake
Serve Neat in coupe glass
Garnish with Lemon Peel

name: Brown Derby
Spec: 1.5 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.75 oz Honey Syrup,.75 oz Grapefruit Juice
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 GRAPEFRUIT TWIST Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the grapefruit twist.

name: Chocolate Mojito
Spec: 6 Mint Leaves,.5 oz Demerara Syrup,1.5 oz Aged Rum,.5 oz Crème De Cacao,.5 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Papaya Juice,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: Gently muddle leaves with Demerara Syrup in mixing glass. Add spirits, juice, and a generous portion of ice into shaker and shake until cold. Strain over ice into Collins glass. Top with soda water and garnish with mint sprig. Serve with dark chocolate square or shaved chocolate as garnish.

name: Cosnopolital
Spec: 1.75 oz Seedlip Grove 42,1 oz Cranberry Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,.33 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime leaf.

name: Darkside
Spec: 2.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Barolo Chinato,3 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters
Instructions: Combine all liquid ingredients in a mixing glass or a shaker with ice and stir or shake until very cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Easy Chair
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,4 dashes Orange Bitters,4 oz Ginger Ale
Instructions:
Serve w/ Ice in collins glass
Garnish with Orange Peel

name: Enzoni
Spec: 1 oz Gin,1 oz Campari,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,4 Green Grapes
Instructions: Add grapes to your cocktail shaker with ingredients, shake with ice, double strain over ice into a double old fashioned glass. Garnish with 3 speared grapes.

name: Equal Parts
Spec: 1 oz Aquavit,1 oz Raspberry Liqueur,1 oz Lime Juice,1 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into a Collins glass with fresh ice. Garnish with a single Basil Leaf.

name: Flatiron Martini
Spec: Rinse with Orange Liqueur,1.5 oz Vodka,1.5 oz Blanc Vermouth
Instructions: Rinse Nick & Nora glass with orange liqueur. Stir the other ingredients over ice, then strain into the Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Garden Cooler
Spec: 2 oz Seedlip Garden 108,1 oz Simple Syrup,.75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Halekulani Cocktail
Spec: .5 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Orange Juice,.5 oz Pineapple Juice,.25 oz Simple Syrup,.5 tsp Grenadine,1.5 oz Bourbon Whiskey
Instructions:
Shake & Strain into coupe
Garnish with Flamed Angostura Bitters sprayed over top of the drink

name: Honeypie
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,3 dashes Apple Bitters,.75 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions:
Stir w/ Ice
Serve Neat in coupe glass
Garnish with Lemon Peel

name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Simple Syrup,.25 oz Maraschino Liqueur,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,1 dash Absinthe
Instructions:
GARNISH: LEMON PEEL
Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Jungle Bird
Spec: 2 oz Pineapple Juice,.25 oz Demerara Syrup,.75 oz Campari,1.5 oz Blackstrap Rum
Instructions:
Shake over ice and strain
Garnish with Pineapple leaves

name: Kentucky Outlaw
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Orange Juice,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.25 oz Grenadine,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Mai Tai
Spec: .5 oz Orgeat,1 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Simple Syrup,1 oz Jamaican Rum,1 oz Aged Rum
Instructions:
Shake over crushed ice
Open pour into double rocks glass
Garnish with sprig of mint and overturned lime half

name: Manhattan
Spec: 1.5 oz Rye Whiskey,1.5 oz Bourbon Whiskey,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,3 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 BRANDIED CHERRY Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Maple Cooler
Spec: 1.5 oz Seedlip Spice 94,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Maple Simple Syrup
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into rocks glass with one large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Margarita
Spec: 1.75 oz Seedlip Grove 42,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Agave Nectar
Instructions: Add salt to the rim of the glass if desired. Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain over fresh ice into double rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Old-Fashioned
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.25 oz Simple Syrup,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,2 dashes Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST AND 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Garnish with the orange and lemon twists.

name: Orchard Boulevardier
Spec: 4 oz Apple Cider,2 oz Rye Whiskey,1 oz Campari,1 oz Sweet Vermouth
Instructions:
Bring Cider to a Simmer, Add remaining ingredients, and stir
Serve Neat in mug
Garnish with Orange Twist

name: Painkiller
Spec: 1 oz Orange Juice,1 oz Cream of Coconut,4 oz Pineapple Juice,2 oz Rum
Instructions:
Shake and open pour
Garnish with Grated Nutmeg

name: Passion Punch
Spec: 2 oz Seedlip Spice 94,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Passion Fruit Syrup
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into rocks glass with one large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Pussycat
Spec: 1.5 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Campari,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Grapefruit Juice
Instructions:
Wet Shake
Serve Neat in coupe glass
Garnish with Grapefruit Peel

name: Rum Runner
Spec: .75 oz Lime Juice,1 oz Pineapple Juice,2 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters,.75 oz Simple Syrup,2 oz Rum
Instructions:
Garnish: dehydrated lime wheel and pineapple frond
Whip with small amount of ice. Serve in a tall pilsner glass with pebble ice.

name: Seelbach
Spec: 1 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,7 dashes Angostura Bitters,7 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters,Top with Dry Champagne
Instructions:
GARNISH: ORANGE PEEL
Stir all ingredients (except Champagne) together, strain into a flute or coupe glass and top with the champagne.

name: Singapore Sling
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Pineapple Juice,.25 oz Bénédictine,.5 oz Cherry Liqueur
Instructions:
Shake & Strain
Top with Seltzer

name: Strawberry Rhubarb Gin & Tonic
Spec: 1.75 oz Gin,.25 oz Lime Juice,4 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters,Top with Tonic
Instructions: Build in Collins glass over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: The Clover Club
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Raspberry Liqueur,.25 oz Simple Syrup,1 Egg White
Instructions:
Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Remove ice and shake vigorously for at least 10 seconds. Double-strain into a chilled Coupe glass.
Garnish with speared raspberries.

name: The Harvard
Spec: 1 oz Sweet Vermouth,2 oz Cognac,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,1 oz Club Soda
Instructions:
GARNISH: ORANGE PEEL
Stir all the ingredients (except club soda) over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Top with club soda. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Too Soon?
Spec: 1 oz Gin,1 oz Cynar,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,2 Orange Wheel(s)
Instructions: Add orange wheels to your cocktail shaker with ingredients, shake with ice, double strain into. chilled coupe glass.

name: Trader Vic's Grog
Spec: 2 oz Jamaican Rum,1 oz Lemon Juice,1 oz Pineapple Juice,1 oz Passion Fruit Syrup,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake & strain into rocks glass with pebble ice. Garnish with a lime wheel and mint sprig and cherry.

name: Vesper
Spec: 3 oz Gin,1 oz Vodka,.5 oz Blanc Vermouth
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: White Negroni
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Suze Saveur D’autrefois Liqueur,1 oz Blanc Vermouth
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Old-Fashioned
Spec: 1 White Sugar Cube(s),2 dashes Angostura Bitters,2 oz Bourbon Whiskey
Instructions: Muddle the sugar cube and bitters in an Old-Fashioned glass. Add the bourbon and 1 large ice cube and stir until chilled. Garnish with a lemon twist and orange twist.

name: Ideal Old-Fashioned
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,1 dash Aromatic Bitters,1 tsp Demerara Gum Syrup
Instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, then strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist and orange twist.

name: Golden Boy
Spec: 1.5 oz Raisin-Infused Scotch,.5 oz Madeira,.25 oz Apple Brandy,.25 oz Bénédictine,2 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Ti' Punch
Spec: 1 Lime Wedge(s),1 tsp Cane Sugar Syrup,2 oz Rum (Rhum) Agricole Blanc
Instructions: In a double rocks glass, muddle the lime and cane syrup until the lime is well juiced. Add the rum and cracked ice and stir until cold. No garnish.

name: Vermouth Cocktail
Spec: 2 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 tsp Simple Syrup,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Martini
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.75 oz Dry Vermouth
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or olive.

name: Vodka Martini
Spec: 2.5 oz Vodka,.5 oz Dry Vermouth
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or olive.

name: Ideal Martini
Spec: 2 oz Gin,1 oz Dry Vermouth,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or olive.

name: Vesper
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Vodka,.5 oz Blanc Vermouth
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Psycho Killer
Spec: 2 oz Irish Whiskey,.75 oz Cacao Nib–infused Campari,.5 oz Crème De Cacao,.5 oz Banana Liqueur,2 dashes Absinthe
Instructions:
1. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice.
2. Stir, and strain into a Nick & Nora glass.

name: 20th Century
Spec: .75 oz Crème De Cacao,.75 oz Lemon Juice,1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Cocchi Americano
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then double strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Airmail
Spec: 1 oz Aged Rum,.5 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Honey Syrup,Top with Dry Champagne
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients (except the champagne) with ice, then strain into a flute. Top with champagne. No garnish.

name: Aviation
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.5 oz Maraschino Liqueur,.5 tsp Violet Liqueur,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.25 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 BRANDIED CHERRY Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Bamboo
Spec: 1.5 oz Amontillado Sherry,1.5 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 tsp Cane Sugar Syrup,1 dash Angostura Bitters,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bee’s Knees
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.75 oz Honey Syrup,.75 oz Lemon Juice,3 dashes Lavender Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 BRANDIED CHERRY Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry

name: Blood and Sand
Spec: 1 oz Scotch,.5 oz Cherry Liqueur,.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,.75 oz Orange Juice,.5 tsp Lemon Juice
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 BRANDIED CHERRY Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Bobby Burns
Spec: 2 oz Scotch,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,.25 oz Drambuie,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions:
GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST
Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Boulevardier
Spec: 1.5 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,.75 oz Campari
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Brooklyn
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,.75 oz Dry Vermouth,1 tsp Maraschino Liqueur,.25 oz Amaro
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Brown Derby
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Honey Syrup,1 tsp Lemon Juice,1 oz Grapefruit Juice
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 GRAPEFRUIT TWIST Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the grapefruit twist.

name: Caipirinha
Spec: 6 Lime Wedge(s),2 oz Cachaça,1 White Sugar Cube(s),.75 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: In a shaker, muddle the lime with the simple syrup and sugar cube. Add the cachaça and shake with ice, then dump into a double rocks glass. No garnish.

name: Champs-Élysées
Spec: 2 oz Cognac,.5 oz Green Chartreuse,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Charleston Cocktail
Spec: .5 oz Gin,.5 oz Cherry Brandy,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 oz Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Cobra’s Fang
Spec: 1.5 oz Jamaican Rum,.75 oz Overproof Rum,1 tsp Peach Liqueur,2 dashes Absinthe,.5 oz Passion Fruit Syrup,1 tsp Ginger Syrup,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Orange Juice,.5 oz Cinnamon Bark Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT SPRIG AND 1 LIME WHEEL Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint sprig and lime wheel and serve with a straw.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
Spec: .75 oz Gin,.75 oz Orange Liqueur,.75 oz Blanc Vermouth,2 dashes Absinthe,.75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Daiquiri
Spec: 2 oz Rum,1 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WEDGE Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Dark and Stormy
Spec: 2 oz Blackstrap Rum,.75 oz Lime Juice,1 oz Ginger Syrup,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WHEEL AND CANDIED GINGER FLAG In a shaker, combine all the ingredients (except the club soda) and whip (shake with a few pieces of crushed ice just until the ingredients are incorporated). Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda. Garnish with the lime wheel and candied ginger flag and serve with a straw.

name: Diamondback
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Yellow Chartreuse,.5 oz Apple Brandy
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass.

name: Fancy-Free
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Maraschino Liqueur,1 dash Angostura Bitters,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into double rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Fitzgerald
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.75 oz Lemon Juice,1 oz Simple Syrup,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1, LEMON WEDGE Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a double rocks glass. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Flamenco
Spec: 1 oz Genever,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Orgeat,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,1.5 oz Amontillado Sherry
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: French 75
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Cane Sugar Syrup,Top with Dry Champagne
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Shake all the ingredients (except the champagne) with ice, then double strain into a flute. Top with champagne and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: French 95
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Cane Sugar Syrup,Top with Dry Champagne
Instructions: Short shake all the ingredients (except the champagne) with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a fizz glass over 2 ice cubes. Top with champagne. No garnish.

name: Gimlet
Spec: 2 oz Navy-Strength Gin,1.5 oz Lime Cordial
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WEDGE Shake the gin and lime cordial with ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over cracked ice. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Gin Fizz
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Simple Syrup,1 Egg White,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: Dry shake all the ingredients (except the club soda), then shake again with ice. Double strain into a fizz glass and top with club soda. No garnish.

name: Gin Rickey
Spec: 2 oz Gin,1 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WEDGE Short shake all the ingredients (except the club soda) with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Grasshopper
Spec: 1 oz Heavy Cream,1 oz Crème De Cacao,1 oz Crème De Menthe,8 Mint Leaves
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT LEAF In a shaker, gently muddle the mint. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice, then double strain into a coupe. Garnish with the mint leaf.

name: Hanky-Panky
Spec: 2 oz Gin,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,.25 oz Fernet
Instructions: GARNISH: LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Honeysuckle
Spec: 2 oz Rum,.75 oz Lime Juice,.75 oz Honey Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WEDGE Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Jack Rose
Spec: 2 oz Apple Brandy,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,.75 oz Grenadine
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 APPLE FAN Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the apple fan.

name: La Rosita
Spec: 2 oz Tequila,.5 oz Campari,.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Last Word
Spec: .75 oz Gin,.75 oz Green Chartreuse,.75 oz Maraschino Liqueur,.75 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Lucien Gaudin
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 oz Campari,.5 oz Orange Liqueur
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Mai Tai
Spec: 1 Lime Wedge(s),1 oz Rum,1 oz Aged Rum,.25 oz Rum (Rhum) Agricole Blanc,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,1 oz Lime Juice,.75 oz Orgeat,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT BOUQUET Squeeze a lime wedge into a shaker and drop it in. Add the remaining ingredients and short shake with 3 ice cubes. Strain into a snifter filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint bouquet and serve with a straw.

name: Manhattan
Spec: 2.5 oz Rye Whiskey,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 BRANDIED CHERRY Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Margarita
Spec: 2 oz Tequila,.75 oz Orange Liqueur,1 oz Lime Juice,.25 oz Agave Nectar
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WEDGE Rim half of a double rocks glass with salt. Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into the rimmed glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Martinez
Spec: 2 oz Old Tom Gin,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 tsp Maraschino Liqueur,.5 tsp Cherry Brandy,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Martini
Spec: 2.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Dry Vermouth,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Mexican Firing Squad
Spec: 1.5 oz Tequila,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Cane Sugar Syrup,.25 oz Grenadine,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WHEEL AND CHERRY FLAG Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into the glass. Garnish with the lime wheel and cherry flag and serve with a straw.

name: Mint Julep
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.25 oz Simple Syrup,10 Mint Leaves
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT BOUQUET Put the bourbon and simple syrup in a julep tin. Fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Stir with a TEASPOON,, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds, holding the tin by the rim so the entire tin can eventually frost up. Add more crushed ice to fill the drink two-thirds full and stir until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet in the center of the ice and serve with a straw.

name: Mojito
Spec: 6 Mint Leaves,.75 oz Simple Syrup,2 oz Rum,1 oz Lime Juice,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT BOUQUET In a shaker, gently muddle the mint and simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and whip (shake with a few pieces of crushed ice just until the ingredients are incorporated). Dump into and double rocks glass and fill the glass with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint bouquet in the center of the ice and serve with a straw.

name: Moscow Mule
Spec: 2 oz Vodka,.5 oz Lime Juice,.75 oz Ginger Syrup,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WHEEL AND CANDIED GINGER FLAG Short shake all the ingredients (except the club soda) with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda. Garnish with the lime wheel and candied ginger flag and serve with a straw.

name: Mudslide Flip
Spec: 1.5 oz Irish Whiskey,1 oz Coffee Infused Sweet Vermouth,.25 oz Demerara Syrup,1 Egg Yolk,.5 oz Heavy Cream,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: DARK CHOCOLATE Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a pilsner glass filled with crushed ice. Coarsely grate some dark chocolate over the drink and serve with a straw.

name: Negroni
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1 oz Campari,1 oz Sweet Vermouth
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Old-Fashioned
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,1 tsp Demerara Syrup,2 dashes Angostura Bitters,1 dash Aromatic Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST AND 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Garnish with the orange and lemon twists.

name: Old Pal
Spec: 1.5 oz Rye Whiskey,.75 oz Campari,.75 oz Dry Vermouth
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Paloma
Spec: .5 oz Lime Juice,2 oz Tequila,.5 oz Simple Syrup,.5 oz Grapefruit Juice,Top with San Pellegrino Pompelmo Grapefruit Soda
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WHEEL Rim a highball glass with kosher salt. Squeeze the lime into a shaker and drop it in. Add the tequila, grapefruit juice, and simple syrup and short shake with 3 ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and top with grapefruit soda. Garnish with the lime wheel and serve with a straw.

name: Pendennis Club Cocktail
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.75 oz Pendennis Mix,.75 oz Lime Juice,2 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LIME WEDGE Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Piña Colada
Spec: 1.5 oz Aged Rum,.5 oz Overproof Rum,3 dashes Coconut Liqueur,1 oz Pineapple Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,.75 oz Coconut Cream,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT BOUQUET Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a coconut mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint bouquet and serve with a straw.

name: Ping-Pong Cocktail
Spec: 2 oz Sloe Gin,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,2 dashes Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Pink Lady
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.5 oz Apple Brandy,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Honey Syrup,.25 oz Grenadine,1 Egg White
Instructions: GARNISH: 3 BRANDIED CHERRIES ON A COCKTAIL PICK Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Garnish with the cherries.

name: Pisco Sour
Spec: 2 oz Pisco,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,.75 oz Simple Syrup,1 Egg White
Instructions: GARNISH: 3 DROPS ANGOSTURA BITTERS Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a coupe. Garnish with the bitters.

name: Port au Prince
Spec: 2 oz Aged Rum,.25 oz Overproof Rum,.75 oz Velvet Falernum,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Pineapple Juice,.25 oz Grenadine,1 tsp Ginger Syrup,6 Drops Bittermens ’elemakule Tiki Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 PINEAPPLE AND BRANDIED CHERRY FLAG Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a pilsner glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the pineapple and cherry flag.

name: Preakness
Spec: 1.5 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,.25 oz Bénédictine,1 dash Aromatic Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Queen’s Park Swizzle
Spec: 10 Mint Leaves,.75 oz Simple Syrup,1 White Sugar Cube(s),2 oz Rum,1 oz Lime Juice,4 dashes Angostura Bitters,4 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT SPRIG In a shaker, gently muddle the mint with the simple syrup and sugar cube. Add the rum and lime juice and whip (shake with a few pieces of crushed ice just until the ingredients are incorporated). Dump into a pilsner glass filled with crushed ice. Swizzle until cold, then top with the bitters and swizzle them into the top of the drink. Garnish with the mint sprig and serve with a straw.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,1 oz Simple Syrup,1 oz Heavy Cream,1 Egg White,6 Drops Orange Flower Water,2 oz Club Soda
Instructions: Dry shake all the ingredients (except the club soda), then fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake until the tin is almost too cold to hold. Double strain into a highball glass and let rest for 3,0 seconds, then slowly top with club soda. Serve with a straw. No garnish.

name: Remember the Maine
Spec: Rinse with Absinthe,2 oz Rye Whiskey,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,.25 oz Cherry Liqueur,.25 oz Cherry Brandy,2 dashes Absinthe
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Rinse a Nick & Nora glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice, then strain into the glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Rob Roy
Spec: 2 oz Scotch,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 2 BRANDIED CHERRIES ON A COCKTAIL PICK Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherries.

name: Rum Julep
Spec: .75 oz Overproof Rum,1.5 oz Aged Rum,.25 oz Velvet Falernum,.25 oz Donn’s Spices #2,.5 oz Orange Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Honey Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT BOUQUET Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a julep tin filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint bouquet.

name: Rusty Nail
Spec: 2 oz Scotch,.75 oz Drambuie,1 dash Aromatic Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Sazerac
Spec: Rinse with Absinthe,1.5 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Cognac,1 tsp Demerara Syrup,4 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST (discard) Rinse a rocks glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients (except the lemon twist) over ice, then strain into the glass. Squeeze the lemon twist over the drink and discard. No garnish.

name: Scofflaw
Spec: 1.5 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 oz Grenadine,.5 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Sidecar
Spec: 2 oz Cognac,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.25 oz Cane Sugar Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Singapore Sling
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.5 oz Cherry Liqueur,.25 oz Orange Liqueur,.25 oz Bénédictine,2 oz Pineapple Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Grenadine
Instructions: GARNISH: 1, PINEAPPLE AND BRANDIED CHERRY FLAG Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the pineapple and cherry flag.

name: South Side
Spec: 5 Mint Leaves,2 oz Gin,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Cane Sugar Syrup,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT LEAF In a cocktail shaker, gently muddle the mint. Add the remaining ingredients, shake with ice, and strain into a coupe. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Stinger
Spec: 2 oz Cognac,.5 oz Crème De Menthe,1 tsp Simple Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT SPRIG Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a double rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint sprig and serve with a straw.

name: Tailspin
Spec: Rinse with Campari,1.5 oz Gin,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,1 oz Green Chartreuse,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Rinse a coupe with Campari and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice, then strain into the coupe. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Ti' Punch
Spec: .5 oz Lime Juice,1 tsp Cane Sugar Syrup,2 oz Rum (Rhum) Agricole Blanc
Instructions: In a double rocks glass, muddle the lime and cane syrup until the lime is well juiced. Add the rum and cracked ice and stir until cold. No garnish.

name: Tom Collins
Spec: 2 oz Gin,1 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Simple Syrup,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE CRESCENT AND CHERRY FLAG Short shake all the ingredients (except the club soda) with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda. Garnish with the orange crescent and cherry flag and serve with a straw.

name: Toronto
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Fernet,1 tsp Demerara Syrup
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Vesper
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Vodka,.5 oz Cocchi Americano
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Vieux Carré
Spec: 1 oz Rye Whiskey,1 oz Cognac,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,1 tsp Demerara Syrup,1 dash Angostura Bitters,1 dash Peychaud’s Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Ward 8
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Orange Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,1 tsp Pomegranate Molasses
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Whiskey Sour
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Simple Syrup,1 Egg White
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 DASH ANGOSTURA BITTERS AND 1 ORANGE CRESCENT AND CHERRY FLAG Dry shake all the ingredients, then shake again with ice. Double strain into a double rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Add a DASH, of bitters on top and garnish with the orange and cherry flag.

name: Zombie Punch
Spec: 3 oz Aged Rum,1 oz Overproof Rum,.5 oz Donn’s Spices #2,.75 oz Zombie Mix,.75 oz Lime Juice,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 MINT SPRIG Shake all the ingredients with 2 ice cubes, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint sprig.

name: White Negroni
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Suze Saveur D’autrefois Liqueur,.75 oz Blanc Vermouth
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over 1, large ice cube. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Oaxaca Old-Fashioned
Spec: 1.5 oz Tequila,.5 oz Mezcal,1 barspoon Agave Nectar,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 ORANGE TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Or strain into double rocks glass with single, large ice cube. To garnish, flame the orange twist over the drink, then drop it in.

name: Moscow Mule
Spec: 2 oz Vodka,.75 oz Lime Juice,Top with Ginger Beer
Instructions: Build liquid ingredients in a mug filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Dirty Martini
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1.5 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 oz Olive Brine
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice until very, very cold, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 3 olives speared.

name: Gibson
Spec: 2 oz Gin,1 oz Dry Vermouth
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 COCKTAIL ONION Stir all the ingredients over ice until very, very cold, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the cocktail onion.

name: Martini (50/50)
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1.5 oz Dry Vermouth,2 dashes Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice until very, very cold, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the lemon twist and discard peel.

name: Spring Rain
Spec: 2 oz Amaro,.5 oz Ginger Syrup,1 dash Celery Bitters,.75 oz Lime Juice,3 Cucumber Wheels
Instructions: Vigorously shake all ingredients with plenty of ice to break up the cucumbers. Double-strain into a chilled Coupe glass. Garnish with a thin slice of cucumber floating on top.

name: Summer Rain
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.5 oz Amaro,.5 oz Ginger Syrup,1 dash Celery Bitters,.75 oz Lime Juice,3 Cucumber Wheels
Instructions: Vigorously shake all ingredients with plenty of ice to break up the cucumbers. Double-strain into a chilled Coupe glass. Garnish with a thin slice of cucumber floating on top.

name: Giovanni Pompelmo
Spec: 1 oz Genever,1 oz Aperitivo,1 oz Aperol,2 dashes Grapefruit Bitters,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: Pour ingredients into a 10-oz. Collins glass and add ice. Gently stir to cool. Top with seltzer. Garnish with grapefruit twist.

name: Negroni
Spec: 2 oz Gin,1 oz Campari,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Add all ingredients to a rocks glass. Add one large format ice cube. Stir to combine. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Secret Service
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Aperitif,.75 oz Chile Liqueur,2 dashes Mole Bitters
Instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass and add plenty of ice. Stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Singapore Prospers
Spec: 1 oz Genever,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Old Tom Gin,1 dash Bittermens Burlesque Bitters,3 dashes Lime Bitters
Instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass and add plenty of ice. Stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Blackberry Julep
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1 oz Blackberry Liqueur,1 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake the ingredients with ice and strain into a Highball glass filled with crushed ice. Stir until the glass begins to frost. Garnish with a tablespoon of marinated mixed berries on top of the drink and a mint sprig.

name: Waterproof Watch
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Aperol,.75 oz Amaro,2 dashes Pimento Bitters
Instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass and add plenty of ice. Stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Aviation
Spec: 1.75 oz Gin,.75 oz Maraschino Liqueur,.75 oz Lemon Juice,1.5 tsp Violet Liqueur
Instructions: Shake the ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled Coupe glass. Express the oil from a lemon twist and use as garnish.

name: Flight Deck
Spec: 1 oz Gin,1 oz Becherovka Liqueur,.25 oz Maraschino Liqueur,.5 oz Lemon Juice,2 dashes Ginger Lemon Tincture
Instructions: Shake the ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled Coupe glass. Express the oil from a lemon twist and use as garnish.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Lime Juice,1 oz Heavy Cream,.25 oz Simple Syrup,3 Drops Orange Flower Water,1 Egg White,Top with Club Soda
Instructions: Dry shake all the ingredients (except the club soda), then fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake until the tin is almost too cold to hold. Double strain into a highball glass and let rest for 30 seconds, then slowly top with club soda. Serve with a straw. No garnish.

name: Overcast Beach Day
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Coconut Milk,.5 oz Orange Juice,.5 oz Pineapple Juice,2 Drops Orange Flower Water,1 Egg White,2 oz Club Soda
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients (except the club soda) with ice for at least 45 seconds. Double strain into a straight sided 8 oz glass and let rest for 45 seconds, then slowly top with club soda. Serve with a straw. No garnish.

name: Bee’s Knees
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Honey Syrup,.75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe.

name: Eastside Fizz
Spec: 2 Cucumber Wheels,8 Mint Leaves,.5 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water),1 oz Lime Juice,2 oz Gin,Top with Club Soda
Instructions:
In a shaker, muddle mint and cucumber. Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Double strain into a Highball glass filled with ice. Top with seltzer. 
Garnish with mint and cucumber.

name: Gin & Tonic
Spec: 2 oz Gin,4 oz Tonic
Instructions:
Add gin to a chilled Goblet. Add ice and stir. Add more ice, and top with tonic.
Garnish as your desire.

name: The Clover Club
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,.75 oz Aquafaba,.5 oz Raspberry Syrup,.75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions:
Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake without ice for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake vigorously for at least 10 seconds. Double-strain into a chilled Coupe glass.
garnish with speared raspberries.

name: Pink Gin
Spec: 2 oz Gin,4 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Dash the Angostura into an Old Fashioned glass, then roll it around to coat the inside. Add the gin, then stir. That's it.

name: Red Gin
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.25 oz Grenadine,3 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters,Splash Club Soda
Instructions:
Combine all ingredients into an Old Fashioned glass. Add ice and stir a few times to combine.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Stone Fence
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,1 dash Angostura Bitters,Top with Apple Cider
Instructions: Pour the spirit (can be swapped out with rye whiskey, rum, or brandy) into highball or Collins glass, and then add a dash of bitters. Top with ice and fill glass to the brim with cider. Stir, garnish with mint, and serve.

name: General's Orders
Spec: 1 oz Aged Rum,.5 oz Rye Whiskey,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,.25 oz Cherry Liqueur
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake and strain into highball glass over ice. Garnish with a miniature American flag 🇺🇸  (optional)

name: Old-Fashioned
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,.25 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water),2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Combine whiskey, simple syrup, and bitters in a mixing glass or pint glass, add ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a double rocks glass, add new ice, and garnish with lemon peel.

name: Mint Julep
Spec: 2 oz Bourbon Whiskey,.5 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water),4 Mint Leaves
Instructions: Muddle 4 mint sprigs with simple syrup in a julep cup. Remove mint after rubbing it around the cup's walls. Fill cup halfway with crushed ice and add bourbon. Fill cup with the rest of the way with crushed ice and garnish with extra mint sprigs to make a bouquet.

name: Sherry Cobbler
Spec: 2 oz Oloroso Sherry,.5 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water),1 Orange Wheel(s)
Instructions: Shake sherry and simple syrup with 2 muddled half wheels of orange and ice. Strain into glass. Top with crushed ice. Garnish with additional half orange wheel, mint sprig, and seasonal berries (raspberries, blueberries, chopped strawberries). Serve with a straw.

name: Sazerac
Spec: Rinse with Absinthe,2 oz Rye Whiskey,.25 oz Simple Syrup,3 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Rinse a rocks glass with absinthe and dump. Stir the remaining ingredients (except the lemon twist) over ice, then strain into the glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink and discard. No garnish.

name: Lost Boys Cocktail
Spec: 2 oz Scotch,.5 oz Honey Syrup,1 dash Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Combine scotch, honey syrup, and bitters in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir. Strain into double rocks glass over ice cubes. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Manhattan
Spec: 2 oz Rye Whiskey,1 oz Sweet Vermouth,1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 BRANDIED CHERRY Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Martinez
Spec: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin,1.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,2 dashes Orange Bitters,1 barspoon Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Martini (50/50)
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1.5 oz Dry Vermouth,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: GARNISH: 1 LEMON TWIST Stir all the ingredients over ice until very, very cold, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the lemon twist and discard peel.

name: Daiquiri
Spec: 2 oz Rum,.75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water)
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Steady Cocktail
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1.5 oz Dry Vermouth,1 barspoon Green Chartreuse
Instructions: Use a scant barspoon of Green Chartreuse. Combine ingredients in a mixing glass or pint glass, add ice, and stir until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Do not garnish.

name: Scofflaw
Spec: 1 oz Rye Whiskey,1 oz Dry Vermouth,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Grenadine,1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

name: Orange Blossom
Spec: 1.5 oz Gin,1.5 oz Orange Juice
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: 3 Mile Limit
Spec: 2 oz Brandy,1 oz Rum,1 dash Lemon Juice,1 barspoon Grenadine
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: 12 Mile Limit
Spec: 1 oz Rum,.5 oz Brandy,.5 oz Rye Whiskey,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Grenadine
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with lemon twist.

name: December 5th Cocktail
Spec: 1.5 oz Ginger Liqueur,1 oz Cognac,.5 oz Lemon Juice,1 dash Aromatic Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with lemon twist.

name: The Bronx
Spec: 2 oz Gin,.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,1 oz Orange Juice
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bloody Mary
Spec: 1.5 oz Vodka,.25 oz Lemon Juice,2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce,4 dashes Tabasco Chipotle Sauce,Pinch of Kosher Salt,Pinch of Black Pepper,4 oz Tomato Juice
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and have another empty shaker ready. Mix by rolling (pouring from one shaker to another with no ice). Pour over ice into highball glass. Serve with lemon and lime wedges.

name: Moscow Mule
Spec: 1.5 oz Vodka,.25 oz Lime Juice,4 oz Ginger Beer
Instructions: Build liquid ingredients in a mug filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel or basil or lemongrass for a pleasing aromatic character.

name: Vodka Martini
Spec: 2.5 oz Vodka,.25 oz Dry Vermouth
Instructions: Dash of olive juice (optional). Combine all liquid ingredients in a mixing glass or a shaker with ice and stir or shake until very cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with olive or lemon peel.

name: The Philly Sling
Spec: 1.5 oz Applejack,1 oz Sloe Gin,.5 oz Lemon Juice,.25 oz Simple Syrup,1 dash Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-aged Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with apple dollar made by cutting a thin apple slice horizontally through core. then removing core from center of slice with cookie cutter or jigger, and adding to drink.

name: Fogcutter
Spec: 1.5 oz Rum,.5 oz Gin,.5 oz Brandy,2 oz Orange Juice,1 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Orgeat,.5 oz Amontillado Sherry
Instructions: Combine all ingredients except sherry and mint sprig in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain over fresh ice in double rocks glass. Float sherry on top and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Queen’s Park Swizzle
Spec: 1 oz Lime Juice,10 Mint Leaves,1 oz Rum,.75 oz Overproof Rum,.5 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water),.5 oz Velvet Falernum,13 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Squeeze juice from half a lime, retaining shell. Add four mint sprigs to bottom of highball glass. Fill highball glass halfway with crushed ice, add liquid ingredients, and swizzle. Add lime shell and fill the rest of the way with crushed ice. Swizzle again until glass is frosted. Top with 13 dashes of angostura bitters and garnish with mint sprig.

name: The Getaway
Spec: 1 oz Blackstrap Rum,1 oz Lemon Juice,.5 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2 Parts Sugar to 1 Part Water),.5 oz Cynar
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
Spec: 1.5 oz Vodka,4 oz Orange Juice,.75 oz Galliano Liqueur
Instructions: Build vodka and orange juice in highball glass with ice. Float Galliano on top. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Tequila Sunrise
Spec: 1.5 oz Tequila,4 oz Orange Juice,1 dash Grenadine
Instructions: Build tequila and orange juice in highball glass with ice. Add grenadine and jiggle drink with a bar spoon until the layers settle. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: Slow Screw
Spec: 1 oz Vodka,1 oz Sloe Gin,3 oz Orange Juice
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain over fresh ice in highball glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: White Russian
Spec: 1 oz Vodka,1 oz Kahlua Liqueur,1 oz Heavy Cream
Instructions: Build in double rocks glass with ice. Pour cream over, stir, and serve.

name: Stay Off The Grass
Spec: 1 oz Brandy,.75 oz Heavy Cream,.75 oz Cream Sherry,.5 oz Crème De Menthe,.5 oz Crème De Cacao,.5 tsp Cold Brewed Coffee
Instructions: Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate mint sprig.

name: Cosmopolitan
Spec: 1.5 oz Vodka,.5 oz Orange Liqueur,1 oz Cranberry Juice,.25 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel.

name: Cable Car
Spec: 1.5 oz Spiced Rum,1 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Coat the rim of the chilled cocktail glass with cinnamon sugar by rubbing a lemon slice around the edge of the glass, then turn the glass on it's side and dip into cinnamon sugar mixture, turning until it's coated all around the outside of the rim. Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Vodka Espresso
Spec: 2 oz Vodka,1 oz Espresso,.5 oz Coffee Liqueur,.25 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with 3 espresso beans.

name: Tommy's Margarita
Spec: 2 oz Tequila,1 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Agave Nectar
Instructions: Add salt to the rim of the glass if desired. Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain over fresh ice into double rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Penicillin
Spec: 2 oz Scotch,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Honey Ginger Syrup,1 barspoon Scotch
Instructions: Combine liquid ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain over fresh ice in double rocks glass. Garnish with a candied ginger.

name: Gin Gin Mule
Spec: .75 oz Lime Juice,.5 oz Simple Syrup,4 Mint Leaves,1.75 oz Gin,1 oz Ginger Beer
Instructions: Combine lime juice, simple syrup, and mint leaves into a mixing glass. Muddle well. Add gin, ginger beer, and ice. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve with a long straw. Garnish with lime wheel, candied ginger, and a mint sprig.

name: Salad Days Sour
Spec: 1.5 oz Celery-Infused Pisco,.75 oz Lemon Juice,.75 oz Simple Syrup,1 Egg White
Instructions:
Combine pisco, lemon, simple syrup, and egg white in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Strain into chilled glass and garnish with cinnamon ash** (try to use the ash to draw a line down the middle of the drink) and a carrot confetti***.


** Burn loose cinnamon with a pastry torch in a large metal owl.
*** Slice small peels of a carrot (can be different colored ones) then soak them in ice water until they curl.

name: Applejack
Spec: 1.5 oz Applejack,.5 oz Apple Cider,.5 oz Simple Syrup,.5 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake & Strain into coupe

name: Best Fronds
Spec: 2 dashes Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters,.75 oz Sweet Vermouth,.75 oz Campari,1.5 oz Pineapple Rum
Instructions: Stir & strain into chilled coupe or on the rocks. Garnish with a lime peel

name: Lucien Gaudin
Spec: .5 oz Orange Liqueur,.5 oz Campari,.5 oz Dry Vermouth,1.5 oz Gin
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. Orange twist garnish.

name: The Star
Spec: 1.5 oz Sweet Vermouth,1.5 oz Applejack,2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
